main event: A UFO sighting was reported in the area of the Southern Butte of Idaho Falls, Idaho on August 7, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting was described by Deputy Sheriff Marc Paul who observed a large oval-shaped object emitting a bright light., The object hovered about 400 yards above the ground for approximately 9-10 minutes before shooting straight up into the sky at high speed., The estimated diameter of the object was about 40-60 feet and it made no sound while in view., The witness described this as the largest and brightest object of its type he had ever seen., Additionally, this report is part of the Project Blue Book documentation managed by the USAF.
sighted object: large oval-shaped object emitting a bright light
witness description: Marc Paul, T.S., Deputy Sheriff with 4 years of police experience
